long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IB DataXchange is a Chrome extension for your EMR. You can now access all patient information from your previous EMR/ EHR such as complaints, patient history, medication and other documents. All CCD information will now be available from your new EMR. The most easy to use and hassle free migration of your patient data is now just a few clicks away
